topics.body: Well I finally managed to watch Wolf Children with mom and grandma. She said she was headed over there and I asked her to pick me on the way. We watched it. I cried. So what did I miss?
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55542c636368723053811f00#post_55542c636368723053811f00
I think some of the magic of Wolf Children affected grandma. After we got done with the movie and we started getting ready to head out she didn't want me to leave. She kept making excuses like "it's too late to drive" or "it's too dark."

topics.body:
Say what you will about the "Romeo+Juliet" film, but no one can deny that it has the most beautiful ordnance to ever the grace the silver screen. Especially the Taurus PT99s with various features

Benvolio's Sword 9mm Series S
!http://www.imfdb.org/images/f/fe/Benvoliogun.jpg!
!http://www.imfdb.org/images/thumb/4/4a/RJ-01844.jpg/800px-RJ-01844.jpg!

Tybalt's Rapier 9mm Series R(He uses a pair of them in a rather flamboyant manner)
!http://www.imfdb.org/images/1/1c/Tybaltgun.jpg!
!http://www.imfdb.org/images/thumb/7/71/RJ-00573.jpg/800px-RJ-00573.jpg!
